response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to you, estimated at $1,500,000. I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a remarkable opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discounted rate. I trust this proposal will meet your financial considerations and enhance your experience with our product. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product or this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
